dcterms:creator: M. S. Lewis
K. E. Pflum
dcterms:description: This dataset provides empirical evidence on hospital system bargaining power in managed care networks, analyzing the effects of cross-market mergers on negotiated prices.
dcterms:title: Diagnosing Hospital System Bargaining Power in Managed Care Networks

dcterms:creator: L. Dafny
K. Ho
R. S. Lee
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the price effects of cross-market mergers in the hospital industry, providing theoretical and empirical insights.
dcterms:title: The Price Effects of Cross-Market Mergers: Theory and Evidence from the Hospital Industry

dcterms:creator: K. Brand
T. Rosenbaum
dcterms:description: This dataset reviews the economic literature on cross-market health care mergers, summarizing key findings and implications.
dcterms:title: A Review of the Economic Literature on Cross-Market Health Care Mergers

dcterms:creator: G. S. Vistnes
Y. Sarafidis
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a holistic approach to analyzing cross-market hospital mergers, focusing on their competitive implications.
dcterms:title: Cross-Market Hospital Mergers: A Holistic Approach

dcterms:creator: K. Easterbrook
G. Gowrisankaran
D. Older Aguilar
Y. Wu
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the need for accounting for complementarities in hospital mergers and critiques current approaches.
dcterms:title: Accounting for Complementarities in Hospital Mergers: Is a Substitute Needed for Current Approaches?

dcterms:creator: C. T. Peters
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the effects of joint negotiation and the recapture effect in the context of bargaining power.
dcterms:title: Bargaining Power and the Effects of Joint Negotiation: The ‘Recapture Effect’

dcterms:creator: A. Rhodes
M. Watanabe
J. Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the role of multiproduct intermediaries in the context of economic theory.
dcterms:title: Multiproduct Intermediaries
